title: PostgreSQL Terraform Module Design
description: Design and implement the base Terraform module for Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server, including VNet integration and firewall rules.
sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
acceptance_criteria: Module provisions Flexible Server; VNet integration configured; Firewall restricts external access
definition_of_done: Terraform plan applies cleanly; Security scan passed

title: PostGIS Extension & Read Replica Config
description: Extend module to enable PostGIS extension via server parameters and configure read replica for analytics.
sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
acceptance_criteria: PostGIS active on primary; Read replica synchronizing; Connection strings output
definition_of_done: Extension verified via SQL; Replica connection tested
collaboration_required: Backend Lead for connection string mapping

title: Passport Azure AD Strategy Implementation
description: Implement passport-azure-ad strategy to validate JWTs against B2C tenant JWKS.
sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
acceptance_criteria: Valid tokens decoded; Invalid tokens 401; Claims extracted
definition_of_done: Unit tests passing; Integration with mock B2C token working

title: RBAC Guard & Decorators Development
description: Create @Roles() decorator and RolesGuard to enforce role-based access control.
sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
acceptance_criteria: Guard blocks missing roles; Allows matching roles; Tests cover permutations

title: Native Permission & Config Setup
description: Configure iOS Info.plist and Android AndroidManifest.xml for background location permissions.
sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
acceptance_criteria: iOS requests Always permission; Android foreground notification works; No crashes on denial
definition_of_done: Builds successful on both platforms; Permissions flow verified
deployment_notes: Requires store review notes for background location

title: Mapbox Component Shell
description: Initialize Mapbox GL JS within a React component with secure API key injection.
sprint_goal: Establish core infrastructure and security foundation
acceptance_criteria: Map renders base tiles; Zoom/Pan works; Resizes correctly

title: PostGIS Data Access Layer Implementation
description: Implement TypeORM entities for Service Center polygons and raw SQL for spatial queries.
sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
acceptance_criteria: Entities map to geometry columns; Spatial queries return correct center; Migrations created
definition_of_done: Integration tests with test container DB passing

title: Routing Logic & Load Balancing
description: Implement business logic for overlapping areas and Redis-based round-robin distribution.
sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
acceptance_criteria: Handles overlapping polygons; Round-robin works; Fallback logic active
definition_of_done: Unit tests for distribution logic; Redis integration verified

title: Background Service Logic Implementation
description: Implement headless task for coordinate capture and lifecycle management.
sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
acceptance_criteria: Captures coords in background/killed state; Battery config applied; Auto-stop works

title: OpenSearch Integration Service
description: Develop NestJS service for OpenSearch connection and bulk indexing.
sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
acceptance_criteria: Secure connection established; Bulk insert works; Error handling prevents crashes
definition_of_done: Service unit tested with mock client

title: Audit Interceptor Implementation
description: Implement NestJS Interceptor for async logging of request data.
sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
acceptance_criteria: Captures metadata; Scrubs sensitive data; Non-blocking execution
definition_of_done: Interceptor applied globally; Logs visible in OpenSearch

title: WatermelonDB Schema & Setup
description: Define WatermelonDB schema and configure native JSI adapters.
sprint_goal: Deliver offline capabilities and advanced visualization
acceptance_criteria: DB initializes on both platforms; Schema supports core entities; Encryption active

title: Sync Adapter Implementation
description: Implement synchronize() function for push/pull logic.
sprint_goal: Deliver offline capabilities and advanced visualization
acceptance_criteria: Pull retrieves changes; Push sends dirty records; Batching works

title: Conflict Resolution Strategy
description: Implement 'Last Write Wins' logic in sync adapter.
sprint_goal: Deliver offline capabilities and advanced visualization
acceptance_criteria: Server changes overwrite local on conflict; Conflicts logged
definition_of_done: Unit tests for conflict logic passing

title: Drawing Tools Integration
description: Integrate mapbox-gl-draw for admin polygon editing.
sprint_goal: Implement core business logic for routing and auditing
acceptance_criteria: Draw polygons; Output valid GeoJSON; Edit vertices

title: Clustering & Heatmap Visualization
description: Implement data layers for point clustering and heatmaps.
sprint_goal: Deliver offline capabilities and advanced visualization
acceptance_criteria: Points cluster at zoom; Heatmap configurable; Performance OK for 10k points
